parameters.name: BeginTime
parameters.description: The timestamp that indicates the beginning of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The timestamp that indicates the end of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance to which the topic you want to query belongs.

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description: The sampling period. Unit: minutes. Valid values: 1, 5, and 10.

parameters.name: Topic
parameters.description: The name of the topic that you want to query.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of information that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **0**: the number of messages that are published to the topic during each sampling period.
*   **1**: the TPS for message publishing in the topic during each sampling period.
